DOC.brief_summary: The trial single-centre , randomize , double-blind , phase 1b trial multiple ascend dos ZP4207 administer s.c. healthy volunteer ( HV ) evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmakocinetic ( PK ) pharmacodynamic ( PD ) . Three cohort 8 subject plan . Within cohort , subject randomly assign five repeated dos ZP4207 placebo 3:1 treatment allocation trial site .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Doses ZP4207 Administered HV Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , PKs PDs ZP4207
